entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
